tweets.text: @ChemmySki Please can you report this to our free 24-hour  incident hotline on 0800 80 70 60 so that we can take full details. Thank you.

Morbidly fitting on the day of peaceful Protest number 2 the Westlands stinks to high heaven of landfill gas. We‚Äôve turned the air purifier up manually as we could still smell it & my husbands been dreaming of us being gassed in our beds! @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @cleanairdayuk https://t.co/2wqLNbyq9Q

#TeamEA have been on site of a pollution to the River Yarrow in Lancashire. Investigations are currently ongoing into the cause of this incident. Our thanks go to members of the public who reported this to our 24/7 incident hotline - 0800 80 70 60 https://t.co/ge57Ds891o

Our new mooring is looking wonderful! Due to be completed over the next few weeks üì∏‚òÄÔ∏èüõ∂

tweets.text: Further concerns that @EnvAgency not fit for purpose. Their latest response to my request (residents also asking) to clear serious blockages of River Brain in #Witham is to try to get someone else to do it. One blockage is of whole width and depth of river with fallen trees (1/2)

Labour candidate for Keele, Knutton & Silverdale, @DaveJonesNuL, has from the start supported calls to close Walleys Quarry. Yesterday, he visited the site on a particularly bad day. #StopTheStink #CapItOff https://t.co/J0z6LZcVgi

On average, a person at rest takes about 16 breaths per minute. This means we breathe about 960 breaths an hour, 23,040 breaths a day, 8,409,600 a year.
In 10 years thats roughly 85 million breaths of LFG & you say it's of little risk next to a landfill out of control! https://t.co/FRfVI8XPU1

For anyone thinking that this either doesn't matter or it's not that serious.
Look at this over 1000 impact statements. How is this even acceptable something needs be done! 
Please re-tweet @MrPeterAndre @MrNickKnowles @RobbieRinder @robbiewilliams @Jonny_Wilkes
#stopthestink https://t.co/IB7mczX9xh
